{{> searchbar}}
  • Why is my home screen blank?

    When you find a page you know you will want to come back to again, select the star in the upper right hand corner. This places a star-shortcut link on your home page. If you no longer want the link on your homepage, deselect the star. This allows you to customize your home screen for how you use the app.

  • Using search doesn’t work for words we commonly use in my language.

    You can help us create a better search. Send us your ideas for search terms and what pages you would expect to find if you searched using that term.

  • I’m using the method chooser with women I’m counseling and it gives results for some methods not available in my country. Can I remove those methods from the results?

    You can remove methods from the method chooser if they are not available. We think that by including them you can see what might be most widely used if it was available. This can give you and the women you counsel an opportunity to advocate for that method being available. But if those methods just get in your way, you can remove them from the results in Settings

  • Why did I lose my preferences (stars, language or method chooser settings)?

    Sometimes, when your phone runs out of storage space or memory, the phone deletes information like this to gain space. Sorry, make more space by deleting something else and reset your preferences.

  • My language isn’t listed in the right-hand menu. Why not?

    If you don’t see it, it’s not yet translated. Email us at Hesperian mobile@hesperian.org if you have the time, interest or resources to translate this app into more languages. We can provide you with details and also let you know if a translation is already underway.

  • I want to help make this app better. How can I help?

    By testing the app in communities around the world, we hope to generate suggestions for improvements. Email us at mobile@hesperian.org and we can tell you how you can participate.

    And thank you!
